activities: Cincom's activities with respect to personal information is used as set forth in the Cincom privacy policy located on the www.cincom.com website, including for HR related purposes, specifically name and address of employees.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization employee data. Customer data as described in Cincom's privacy policy.
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs); for all other categories of data: JAMS Safe Harbor Program
